ygData.subject: RE: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: i think he is using a bind argument in order to really say we could use just 1 more defensive skill, such as parry.  i agree that we should get parry and have
ygData.messageBody:
i think he is using a bind argument in order to really say we could use just
1 more defensive skill, such as parry. i agree that we should get parry and
have it capped around the same as our dodge (125?). it would just put us
one very small notch towards a melee class, which i do think we are far more
than a cleric or shaman. i've always thought we should not get bind, and
all the reasons for and against have already been gone over a million times.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> You seriously downplay the value of bind... why do yo want it?
>
>
> I'm a singer not a fighter.
